definition: A term commonly employed to refer to a variety of edible plants, typically cultivated for their leaves, stems, roots, or fruits, which are consumed as part of a meal. It is frequently used in the context of cooking, nutrition, and dietary discussions.

examples.german: Meine Mutter kocht immer frisches Gemüse.
examples.english: My mother always cooks fresh vegetables.

examples.german: Ich kaufe mein Gemüse auf dem Wochenmarkt.
examples.english: I buy my vegetables at the weekly market.
